process: Apply online through the official admissions portal.
Appear for KLCET or accepted entrance examination.
Pay admission fee to confirm seat.
admissions.eligibility_btech: Minimum 60% in 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics and valid entrance exam score.

scholarships.merit_based: Students with strong academic performance are eligible for fee reductions.
scholarships.marks_based: Students with ≤ 90% in qualifying examinations may receive partial fee reduction based on university policy.
scholarships.sports: Scholarships available for students with outstanding sports achievements.
scholarships.need_based: Financial assistance provided for eligible students based on financial background.

examinations.internal_weightage: 60% Internal Evaluation (mid exams, assignments, projects, lab performance).
examinations.attendance_requirement: Minimum 85% attendance required to appear for semester exams.

rules.summary: KL University has strict academic, conduct, hostel, and institutional rules that students must follow.

academic_conduct.attendance: A minimum of 85% attendance is mandatory for all courses.
academic_conduct.evaluation: In-semester evaluations contribute a maximum of 50% to the total marks.

code_of_conduct.discipline: Strict silence and discipline must be maintained.
code_of_conduct.prohibited: Ragging, smoking, alcohol consumption are strictly prohibited.
code_of_conduct.dress_code: Students must wear the prescribed uniform.

hostel.summary: Hostel rules emphasize discipline, safety, punctuality, and responsible behavior.

timings.first_year: First-year students must be inside by 3:00 PM.
timings.seniors: Senior students must return by 6:00 PM.

hostel.visitors: Visitors allowed only in visitors' hall with permission until 7:30 PM.
hostel.prohibited_items: Electrical appliances, alcohol, drugs, cigarettes strictly prohibited.
hostel.property_safety: Damage to hostel property attracts double fine.
hostel.meals: Food must be consumed only in dining hall.

administrative.fee_payment: Hostel fees must be paid before 5th of every month.

fees.hostel_fees: ₹80,000 to ₹1.8 Lakhs per year depending on facilities.

library.timings: Central Library Timings: 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM.
library.books: Students can borrow up to 4 books at a time.
